input:
Question: Can you please list all the ingredients in this article? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup milk, 1/2 pound ground walnuts, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Beat together cream cheese and margarine until well blended. 1) Add flour, mixing well. 2) Shape into a ball, cover and chill for 2 hours. 3) In saucepan over medium heat, cook sugar and milk, stirring occasionally until milk boils and sugar is dissolved. 4) Add the ground nuts. 5) Remove from heat and let cool until mixture is of spreading consistency. 6) Roll out chilled dough on lightly floured surface to a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches. 7) Cut in half lengthwise. 8) Spread each piece with milk/nut filling and roll up like a jelly-roll, starting from the long side. 9) Cut each roll in half. 10) Place seam side down on ungreased cookie sheets (two on a baking sheet). 11) Leaving roll's shape intact, cut into slices 1/2 inch thick almost to the bottom of the roll. 12) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes or till done. 13) Remove from sheet and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar. 14) Cool on racks. 15) Cut cookies all the way through. 16) Refrigerate or freeze. 17) Resprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.
conv_answer: First two are 1 package cream cheese, softened and 1/2 cup butter, softened.
target_answer: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened

predictions: 1/2 cup butter, softened
labels: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened

Directions: 0) Beat together cream cheese and margarine until well blended. 1) Add flour, mixing well. 2) Shape into a ball, cover and chill for 2 hours. 3) In saucepan over medium heat, cook sugar and milk, stirring occasionally until milk boils and sugar is dissolved. 4) Add the ground nuts. 5) Remove from heat and let cool until mixture is of spreading consistency. 6) Roll out chilled dough on lightly floured surface to a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches. 7) Cut in half lengthwise. 8) Spread each piece with milk/nut filling and roll up like a jelly-roll, starting from the long side. 9) Cut each roll in half. 10) Place seam side down on ungreased cookie sheets (two on a baking sheet). 11) Leaving roll's shape intact, cut into slices 1/2 inch thick almost to the bottom of the roll. 12) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes or till done. 13) Remove from sheet and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar. 14) Cool on racks. 15) Cut cookies all the way through. 16) Refrigerate or freeze. 17) Resprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.
conv_answer: Not yet. Now cut cookies all the way through. Then refrigerate or freeze.
target_answer: 15) Cut cookies all the way through.

Question: What do I need to do first. 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces, sea salt to taste, 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste, 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste, 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder, ground black pepper to taste, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1 small yellow onion, diced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced, 5 cups water, 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained, 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco), 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 
Directions: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Place chicken in the pot; brown on all sides. 2) Season with sea salt, chili powder, cumin, ground chipotle, black pepper,  and cayenne pepper. 3) Mix in onion, green bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper. 4) Pour in about 3 cups water, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until about 1/2 the water has evaporated. 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot. 6) Season with green pepper sauce. 7) Reduce heat to low, and mix in remaining 2 cups water and tomato paste. 8) Simmer, stirring occasionally 30 minutes, or until thickened. 9) Top with cilantro to serve.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon. 3) Set aside. 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended. 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated. 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts. 8) Pour batter into prepared pan. 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork. 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla. 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes. 13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.

Question: Wow! Could you tell me the ingredients first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Yes. The first two ingredients are 2 1 fourth cups all-purpose flour and 2 teaspoons baking soda.
target_answer: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour

labels: 1/2 teaspoon salt

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: 1/2 teaspoon salt and 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped.
target_answer: 1/2 teaspoon salt

conv_answer: Now take a double boiler and heat 6 ounces of chocolate. Keep stirring occasionally, until chocolate becomes melted and smooth. Afterwards, remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
conv_answer: Good. No, not yet.

Question: How do I make baked aloha chicken? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup light corn syrup, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/4 cup corn oil, 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple (not drained), 10 chicken leg quarters, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Stir together lemon juice, corn syrup, soy sauce, salt, ginger, and corn oil in a bowl until smooth. 2) Stir in the crushed pineapple with its liquid. 3) Place the chicken legs in an ovenproof glass baking dish, and pour sauce over top. 4) Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, then turn the chicken over, and continue cooking until the chicken is tender, and no longer pink, about 20 minutes. 5) Baste with sauce frequently while baking.
conv_answer: Hi. the first step is to preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
target_answer: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

input:
Question: Ok, I got the blender here. What do I combine first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup water, 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1 cup milk, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided, 1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 2 cups frozen chopped broccoli, thawed, 
Directions: 0) For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender. 1) Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes. 2) Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. 3) Stir in flour until blended. 4) Gradually stir in milk. 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. 6) Reduce heat to low. 7) Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted. 8) Stir in broccoli. 9) Cover; keep warm. 10) Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet. 11) Lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom. 12) Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer. 13) Remove to a wire rack. 14) Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed. 15) Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up. 16) Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. baking dish. 17) Sprinkle with remaining cheese. 18) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
conv_answer: First, add 2 eggs, 1/4 cup water and 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour.

Directions: 0) For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender. 1) Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes. 2) Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. 3) Stir in flour until blended. 4) Gradually stir in milk. 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. 6) Reduce heat to low. 7) Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted. 8) Stir in broccoli. 9) Cover; keep warm. 10) Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet. 11) Lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom. 12) Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer. 13) Remove to a wire rack. 14) Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed. 15) Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up. 16) Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. baking dish. 17) Sprinkle with remaining cheese. 18) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.
conv_answer: Boil the mixture over medium heat and stir constantly.
target_answer: 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.

labels: 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.

Question: How do I prepare Sounds good to me! 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 4 chicken drumsticks, skin removed, 4 chicken thighs, skin removed, 4 celery ribs, sliced, 1 cup sliced zucchini, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 medium onion, sliced, 1 cup tomato juice, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, pepper to taste, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 3 tablespoons cold water, Hot cooked rice, 
Directions: 0) Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker. 1) Add the celery, zucchini, carrots, onion, tomato juice, broth, garlic, paprika and pepper. 2) Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear. 3) Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm. 4) Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat. 5) Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices. 6) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 7) Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.

input:
Question: What are the next ingredients for active dry yeast? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast, 2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided, 1/3 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon salt, 1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour, 5 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water. 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth. 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half. 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in. 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork. 10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes. 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
conv_answer: The next ingredients are one third cup of sugar and 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil.
target_answer: 1/3 cup sugar

predictions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water.

Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water. 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth. 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half. 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in. 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork. 10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes. 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.

Question: How should I start? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1 egg, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 1/2 cups sifted all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup rolled oats, 1/4 teaspoon peppermint extract, 3 drops red food coloring, 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, 5 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy. 1) Blend in egg and vanilla. 2) Sift together flour and salt. 3) Add to creamed mixture and mix well. 4) Stir in oats. 5) Divide dough in half. 6) Add peppermint extract and a few drops of food color to half of dough. 7) Chill for several hours. 8) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 9) Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar. 10) Cut out half of each color with the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter, and half with a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter. 11) Place them on unprepared cookie sheets. 12) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. 13) Remove from oven and place 1 one square (1/8) of a chocolate bar onto the center of each large heart. 14) Place small heart on top and press lightly to secure. 15) Transfer to rack to cool.
conv_answer: Great. take a medium bowl and combine 1 cup butter and 1 cup white sugar until it looks light and fluffy.

Question: I have both ingredients in 1 cup shortening. What else is in 1 cup shortening? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 cup shortening, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces, 
Directions: 0) Heat the shortening in a large, cast iron skillet over medium-high heat. 1) In a brown paper lunch bag, combine the flour, salt, and pepper. 2) Shake two chicken pieces in the bag to coat, and place them in the skillet. 3) Repeat until all of the chicken is coated and in the skillet. 4) Fry the chicken over medium-high heat until all of the pieces have been browned on both sides. 5) Turn the heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 25 minutes. 6) Remove the lid, and increase heat to medium-high. 7) Continue frying until chicken pieces are a deep golden brown, and the juices run clear.
conv_answer: Now take 1 teaspoon salt and 1 teaspoon ground black pepper.

Directions: 0) Place the cranberries and water into a large pot. 1) Bring to a boil and cook just until the berries pop, about 5 minutes. 2) Remove from the heat and let stand at room temperature until cold, several hours. 3) Strain out the cranberries and stir the orange juice, pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar into the liquid. 4) Add the cinnamon stick, whole cloves and allspice berries. 5) Bring to a low boil.

Question: what are the first two ingredients in Ok good? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup cold water, 2 apples, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup vegetable oil, 
Directions: 0) Peel and dice apples. 1) Add sugar and cinnamon. 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce. 4) Sift flour and salt together. 5) Cut in the shortening. 6) Add water and mix with fork. 7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board. 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter). 9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit. 10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork. 11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown. 13) Drain on paper towels. 14) Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.
conv_answer: The first two are 2 cups of all-purpose flour and half a cup of shortening.
target_answer: 2 cups all-purpose flour

Directions: 0) Peel and dice apples. 1) Add sugar and cinnamon. 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce. 4) Sift flour and salt together. 5) Cut in the shortening. 6) Add water and mix with fork. 7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board. 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter). 9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit. 10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork. 11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown. 13) Drain on paper towels. 14) Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.

input:
Question: Could you give me the ingredients so I can prepare it? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups chopped, cooked chicken meat, 2 cups fresh chopped broccoli, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons Dijon-style prepared mustard, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic. 1) Mix all together. 2) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 3) Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. 4) Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet. 5) Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun. 6) Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll. 7) Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle. 8) Remove glass from cookie sheet. 9) Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake. 10) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown.

Question: How should I start with Ok. sounds good. How should I start? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 pounds Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and thinly sliced, 3/4 cup cranberries, 1/4 cup white sugar, 3 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1/3 cup quick-cooking oats, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar, 1/4 cup butter, cut into pieces, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C.) Butter an 8 inch square baking dish. 1) In a large bowl, mix together apples, cranberries, white sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. 2) Place evenly into baking dish. 3) In the same bowl, combine oats, flour and brown sugar. 4) With a fork, mix in butter until crumbly. 5) Stir in pecans. Sprinkle over apples. 6) Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 50 minutes, or until topping is golden brown, and apples are tender.

Question: Can you give me the ingredients first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped, 2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries, 1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute, 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice, 1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 3 tablespoons low-fat milk, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside. 1) In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice. 2) Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture. 3) Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together. 4) Divide dough into 6 portions. 5) Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan. 6) Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans. 7) Place tart pans on a large baking sheet. 8) Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal. 9) Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil. 10) Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender. 11) Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes. 12) Carefully remove sides of tart pans. 13) Serve warm or cool.
conv_answer: Sure first 2 medium cooking apples. They should be peeled, cored, and chopped.
target_answer: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped

 Context: Ingredients: 2 medium cooking apples, peeled, cored, and chopped, 2/3 cup fresh or frozen blueberries, 1 tablespoon heat-stable granular sugar substitute, 1/2 teaspoon apple pie spice or ground allspice, 1 1/3 cups whole wheat pastry flour, 1/4 teaspoon kosher salt, 1/3 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 3 tablespoons low-fat milk, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl combine apples, blueberries, sugar substitute, and the 1/4 teaspoon apple pie spice; set aside. 1) In another medium bowl stir together whole wheat pastry flour, kosher salt, and the 1/8 teaspoon apple pie spice. 2) Add oil and milk all at once to flour mixture. 3) Stir lightly with a fork until dough comes together. 4) Divide dough into 6 portions. 5) Using six 3 1/2- to 4-inch individual tart pans with removable bottoms, press one dough portion on the bottom and up the side of each tart pan. 6) Divide fruit mixture among pastry-lined pans. 7) Place tart pans on a large baking sheet. 8) Place a large piece of foil over tart pans; press down lightly around the edges to seal. 9) Bake in a 375 degrees F oven for 20 minutes; remove foil. 10) Bake about 20 minutes more or until fruit is tender. 11) Let cool in tart pans on a wire rack for 15 minutes. 12) Carefully remove sides of tart pans. 13) Serve warm or cool.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). 1) Place roast in a large roasting pan and scatter chopped onions over. 2) In a large bowl, combine Worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, garlic powder, salt and pepper. 3) Pour in beer, stir and add to roasting pan. 4) Add water to the top of beef. 5) Cover and cook in oven at 275 degrees F (135 degrees C) for 4 to 5 hours. 6) When meat is cooked, shred meat with 2 forks, add barbecue sauce and mix well.

input:
Question: Ok I have 1 medium head garlic at home already. What is next? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 1/2 cup white wine, 2 tablespoons butter, 1 cup milk, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
conv_answer: Nice! The next two are 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts and half a cup of white wine.
target_answer: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts

predictions: 1/2 cup white wine
labels: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Slice the top of the head of garlic, just enough to remove paper and expose the tops of the cloves. 2) Drizzle with olive oil and roast in preheated oven, either in a clay garlic roaster or wrapped in aluminum foil. 3) Roast for 20 minutes or until cloves are soft and slip from skins when pushed. 4) Change oven setting to broil (375 degrees F, 190 degrees C). 5) Let garlic cool. 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine. 7) Broil for 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear. 8) Meanwhile, place butter or margarine and milk in a large skillet and heat over medium heat until warm. 9) Stir in the flour and cheese. 10) Stir over medium heat until sauce begins to thicken. 11) Slip cooled garlic cloves from skin and add to the sauce (if desired, mince first). 12) Add chopped parsley. 13) Bring nearly to a boil; reduce heat and stir to control thickening. 14) If desired, pour sauce over cooked rice or pasta and top with broiled chicken. 15) Enjoy!
conv_answer: It's now time to prepare the chicken. Place it in a 9 by 13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine.
target_answer: 6) To prepare chicken, place in a 9x13 inch baking dish and splash both sides with white wine.

 Context: Ingredients: 4 pounds boneless chuck roast, 2 cups water, 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix, 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce, 3 potatoes, peeled and chopped, 2 stalks celery, chopped, 2 carrots, chopped, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag. 2) Combine water, soup mix, and Worcestershire sauce; pour over roast. 3) Arrange vegetables around meat. 4) Place oven bag on a roasting pan. 5) Place roast in oven, and immediately reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). 6) Bake for 1 1/2 hours for medium well done, or adjust time for desired doneness.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1 3/4 cups white sugar, 1 cup vegetable oil, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups shredded carrots, 1 cup flaked coconut, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, 1/4 cup butter, softened, 2 cups confectioners' sugar, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. 3) Make a well in the center and add sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla. 4) Mix with wooden spoon until smooth. 5) Stir in carrots, coconut, walnuts and pineapple. 6) Pour into 9x13 inch pan. 7) Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes. 8) Don't panic, the center will sink a little. 9) Allow to cool. 10) To make the frosting: Cream the butter and cream cheese until smooth. 11) Add the confectioners sugar and beat until creamy.
conv_answer: Great! We start with the ingredients preparation! There are 15 ingredients. The first three are 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda and 1 teaspoon baking powder.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt and cinnamon. 3) Make a well in the center and add sugar, oil, eggs and vanilla. 4) Mix with wooden spoon until smooth. 5) Stir in carrots, coconut, walnuts and pineapple. 6) Pour into 9x13 inch pan. 7) Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes. 8) Don't panic, the center will sink a little. 9) Allow to cool. 10) To make the frosting: Cream the butter and cream cheese until smooth. 11) Add the confectioners sugar and beat until creamy.

Question: How do I make Alaskan Halibut Lasagna? 
 Context: Ingredients: 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided, 1 1/2 pounds halibut steaks, bones removed and cut into 1 inch cubes, 2 garlic cloves, minced, 3/4 teaspoon dried thyme, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 1/2 cups chicken broth, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 8 ounces lasagna noodles, cooked and drained, 2 cups shredded Swiss cheese, Minced fresh parsley, 
Directions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter. 1) Add halibut, garlic and thyme. 2) Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes. 3) Remove and set aside. 4) Add the remaining butter to the skillet. 5) Stir in flour and salt until smooth; cook and stir until golden brown. 6) Gradually add broth and cream. 7) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 8) In a greased 13-in baking dish, layer half of the noodles, halibut, white sauce and cheese. 9) Repeat layers. 10) Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 20 minutes. 11) Uncover; bake 20 minutes longer or until bubbly. 12) Let stand 15 minutes before serving. 13) Sprinkle with parsley if desired.
conv_answer: Hi. first take a large skillet and put it on the stove on medium heat. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter.
target_answer: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.

predictions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons butter.
labels: 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided

Question: What are the ingredients for Sure, what are the ingredients? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 3 egg yolks, separated, 3 eggs whites, separated, 1 cup heavy whipping cream, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine flour and salt. 1) In a small mixing bowl, beat egg yolks on low while adding cream. 2) Beat for 1 minute. 3) Add to flour mixture; combine on low speed, then beat on medium-high until smooth. 4) In another small mixing bowl and with clean beaters, beat egg whites on high until stiff peaks form. 5) Gently fold into batter. 6) Bake in a preheated waffle iron according to manufacturer's directions. 7) Serve with warm maple syrup or fresh fruit in season.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups sugar, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 2 cups chopped dates, 2 cups chopped walnuts or pecans, 4 eggs, lightly beaten, 2 tablespoons butter, melted, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, confectioners' sugar, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, dates and nuts. 1) Add the eggs, butter and vanilla; stir just until dry ingredients are moistened (batter will be very stiff). 2) Spread in a greased 15-in pan. 3) Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until golden brown. 4) Cool bars on a wire rack. 5) Dust with confectioners' sugar.
conv_answer: It is ready when the bars become golden brown.

Directions: 0) In a large saucepan over medium heat, heat peanut oil. 1) Stir in garlic, ginger, lemon grass, red pepper, coriander and cumin and cook until fragrant, 2 minutes. 2) Stir in chicken and onion and cook, stirring, until chicken is white and onion is translucent, 5 minutes. 3) Stir in bok choy and cook until it begins to wilt, 5 to 10 minutes. 4) Stir in water, coconut milk, fish sauce and cilantro. 5) Simmer until chicken is thoroughly cooked and flavors are well blended, 30 minutes.

Question: Could I have all the ingredients for a medium recipe? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, unsalted, 2 cups Broccoflower, diced, 2 cups assorted wild mushrooms, chopped, 1/2 white onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons garlic, minced, 3 cups Arborio rice, 9 cups chicken stock, unsalted, 1 pinch fresh ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup fresh herbs; tarragon, parsley, chives, diced, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, Salt and pepper to taste, 
Directions: 0) Melt butter and saute Broccoflower, mushrooms, onions and garlic for 10 minutes. 1) Remove sauteed ingredients and place aside. 2) In same pan, cook the rice by adding chicken stock one-cup at a time stirring until well incorporated before adding the next cup. 3) Once chicken stock is absorbed and rice is tender, stir in nutmeg, herbs and season with salt and pepper. 4) Once rice risotto is cooked, stir in the sauteed ingredients, salt and pepper to taste. 5) Stir in Parmesan cheese before serving.
conv_answer: Yes! the first two ingredients are 1 tablespoon butter, unsalted, and 2 cups Broccoflower, diced.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, unsalted, 2 cups Broccoflower, diced, 2 cups assorted wild mushrooms, chopped, 1/2 white onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons garlic, minced, 3 cups Arborio rice, 9 cups chicken stock, unsalted, 1 pinch fresh ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup fresh herbs; tarragon, parsley, chives, diced, 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese, Salt and pepper to taste, 
Directions: 0) Melt butter and saute Broccoflower, mushrooms, onions and garlic for 10 minutes. 1) Remove sauteed ingredients and place aside. 2) In same pan, cook the rice by adding chicken stock one-cup at a time stirring until well incorporated before adding the next cup. 3) Once chicken stock is absorbed and rice is tender, stir in nutmeg, herbs and season with salt and pepper. 4) Once rice risotto is cooked, stir in the sauteed ingredients, salt and pepper to taste. 5) Stir in Parmesan cheese before serving.

Question: How do I make Frosted Ruby Punch? 
 Context: Ingredients: 4 cups cranberry juice, 1 1/2 cups sugar, 1 1/2 cups lemon juice, 1 cup orange juice, 4 cups ginger ale, chilled, 1 quart raspberry sherbet, 
Directions: 0) Pour cranberry juice into a 5-cup ring mold. 1) Freeze over night. 2) In a punch bowl, combine sugar, lemon juice and orange juice until sugar is dissolved; stir in the ginger ale. 3) Remove ice ring from mold; float in punch. 4) Place scoops of sherbet around ring.

Question: Could you tell me which ingredients and which tools I will need first? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 cup butter, softened, 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 4 teaspoons shortening, 3/4 cup ground walnuts, 
Directions: 0) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and confectioners' sugar. 1) Add vanilla. 2) Gradually add flour; mix well. 3) With lightly floured hands, shape tablespoonfuls of batter into cookies. 4) Place cookies apart on ungreased baking sheets. 5) Bake at 350 degrees F for 9-11 minutes or until edges and bottom are lightly browned. 6) Cool for 2-3 minutes before removing to wire racks. 7) In a microwave-safe bowl, melt chocolate chips and shortening; stir until smooth. 8) Drizzle chocolate over half of the cookies. 9) Dip one end of remaining cookies into chocolate, then sprinkle with walnuts.
conv_answer: You will need 7 ingredients. The first two are 1 cup butter, softened and 1/2 cup confectioners' sugar.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups chocolate cookie crumbs, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/4 cup butter, melted, 1/4 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 3 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1 1/2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/4 cup heavy whipping cream, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
conv_answer: Each package should be 8 ounces.
target_answer: 3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F ( 175 degrees C). 1) Lightly grease a 9 inch springform pan. 2) In a small bowl, mix together 1 1/2 cups chocolate wafer crumbs, 2 tablespoons sugar, and melted butter. 3) Press onto the bottom and 1 1/2 inch up the sides of the prepared 9 inch springform pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 5) Allow to cool. 6) Reduce oven temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 7) To Make Filling: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1/4 cup chocolate chips, stirring constantly, until chips are melted. 8) In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and 1 cup of sugar until smooth. 9) Add cocoa and beat well. 10) Add eggs and beat on low until just blended. 11) Stir in 1 teaspoon vanilla and reserved chocolate mixture until blended. 12) Pour over crust. 13) Bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 45 to 50 minutes or until center is almost set. 14) To Make Topping: In a small saucepan, heat 1/4 cup whipping cream and 1 teaspoon vanilla until just before boiling. 15) Stir constantly and be careful not to boil over. 16) Have 1 1/2 cups chocolate chips ready in a small bowl. 17) Pour in the hot cream and stir with a spoon until smooth. 18) Spread over baked cheesecake and refrigerate overnight.
